## Study System
\noindent\hspace{2in}Mountains     
\noindent\hspace{2in}- ~25% of land area on Earth     
\noindent\hspace{2in}- 50% of the human water supply    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- 1/3 of terrestrial plant diversity    
\noindent\hspace{2in}Grasses    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- Cover 1/3 of land area (>10,000 species)    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- Provide the majority of food for humans and domesticated animals    
\noindent\hspace{2in}- All have mycorrhizal fungi in roots and fungi in leaves
